zh-CN.title: 🤖 WebQA Agent
zh-CN.subtitle: 全自动网页评估测试 Agent，一键诊断功能与交互体验
zh-CN.description: 配置参数并运行网站质量检测测试。系统支持排队机制，确保稳定运行。
zh-CN.github_cta: 🌟 在 GitHub 上为我们 Star

config.model_name_info: 使用的视觉模型 (OPENAI SDK 兼容格式)
config.report_language_info: 选择测试报告和日志的显示语言
config.function_test_type_info:
default: 遍历测试，覆盖可点击元素和所有链接
 ai: 基于视觉模型的智能测试，能够模拟真实用户行为、理解业务上下文，验证网页功能。
config.business_objectives_info: ai: 定制不同场景，精准发现复杂功能问题。留空将使用默认设置。
config.default_business_objectives: 生成1个测试用例，每个用例包含6个步骤以内
config.performance_test_info: Gradio 版本不可用；请前往 GitHub 体验
config.security_test_info: Gradio 版本不可用；请前往 GitHub 体验

status.task_id_info: 从测试配置页面获取的任务ID
status.default_message: 📄 请先查询任务状态，成功后将在此显示测试报告
status.input_change_message: 📄 请点击查询状态按钮获取最新状态

messages.error_no_tests: ❌ 错误：至少需要启用一个测试类型
messages.error_no_business_objectives: ❌ 错误：AI功能测试需要设置业务目标
messages.error_base_url_format: Base URL格式不正确，应以http://或https://开头
messages.queue_waiting: ⏳ 请耐心等待，前面还有 {count} 个任务在排队
messages.task_not_found_message: ❌ 任务不存在，请检查任务ID是否正确
messages.task_queued_message: ⏳ 任务正在排队中，请稍后再查询
messages.task_running: 🚀 任务正在执行中，请稍候...
messages.task_running_message: 🚀 任务正在执行中，请稍后再查询结果
messages.task_completed_no_report: ✅ 任务执行完成，但未生成HTML报告
messages.task_completed_no_report_message: ⚠️ 测试执行完成，但未生成HTML报告
messages.no_test_types_enabled: 错误：未启用任何测试类型

en-US.title: 🤖 WebQA Agent
en-US.subtitle: Autonomous web browser agent that audits performance, functionality & UX for QA and vibe-coding creators.
en-US.description: Configure parameters and run website quality detection tests. System supports queue mechanism for stable operation.

config.model_name_info: Vision model to use (OPENAI SDK compatible format)
config.report_language_info: Choose display language for test reports and logs
config.function_test_type_info:
default: Traverse clickable elements & links.
 ai: Vision-model intelligent test simulating users & validating functionality.
config.business_objectives_info: ai: Customize different scenarios, accurately find complex functional issues. Leave blank to use default settings.
config.default_business_objectives: Generate 1 test case with no more than 6 steps per case
config.performance_test_info: Gradio version is not available; please visit GitHub for experience
config.security_test_info: Gradio version is not available; please visit GitHub for experience

status.task_id_placeholder: Enter task ID to query status
status.task_id_info: Task ID obtained from test configuration page
status.default_message: 📄 Please query task status first, report will be displayed here after success
status.input_change_message: 📄 Please click the check status button to get the latest status

messages.error_empty_url: ❌ Error: Target URL cannot be empty
messages.error_no_tests: ❌ Error: At least one test type must be enabled
messages.error_no_business_objectives: ❌ Error: AI function test requires business objectives
messages.error_base_url_format: Base URL format is incorrect, should start with http:// or https://
messages.queue_waiting: ⏳ Please wait patiently, {count} tasks are still queuing ahead
messages.task_not_found_message: ❌ Task not found, please check if the task ID is correct
messages.task_queued_message: ⏳ Task is queuing, please check again later
messages.task_running_message: 🚀 Task is running, please check results later
messages.task_completed_no_report: ✅ Task completed but no HTML report generated
messages.task_completed_no_report_message: ⚠️ Test execution completed but no HTML report generated
